title: Saw something cool about Jhin's Dance!

embed.description: I've noticed something special about Jhin. The way he danced clicked in my head off the bat. I thought many people have no clue what his dance is about, so I decided to make a small video :D The dance called Lezginka. It is common tradition dance amongst Kavkaz people.

body:
The guy is dancing Kavkaz's traditional dance: Lezginka.

New Main.

replies.body: Awesome video !!  I don't remember where the team got their inspiration for the dance, but I think you're right!
Honestly, it was really cool to see. To include a small piece of my culture into your game is heartwarming. Thank you Guys.

> [{quoted}](name=ZeeWolfZ,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RUbEdui9,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-02-02T03:27:15.884+0000)
>
> Honestly, it was really cool to see. To include a small piece of my culture into your game is heartwarming. Thank you Guys.
I'm from Georgia and this dance is just like Georgian dancing it's very cool ;D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Brightmoon,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RUbEdui9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-02T01:26:43.051+0000)
>
> Awesome video !!  I don't remember where the team got their inspiration for the dance, but I think you're right!

When a rioter sends a message to a thread that is without a single community message, I feel like Riot is just releasing unobserved things with those agents, make people blow up and keep the case alive. Don't you? Other then it would be just a waste of time.
Jet fuel can't melt steel beams.
Jet fuel maybe, but planes also have those mind control agents they use to make the chem trails, who knows what temperature THOSE burn at.
I saw him dance and immediately thought "This is a reference to something, I must find out what". You sir just saved me some legwork, have an upvote :p
Plot twist: Jhin is a Georgian dancer in disguise.
